note: An over-60s nobody. Lifelong chronic medical stuff. Plodded along unknowingly for fifty years. Now have knowledge. Main pic is me and my American love. She was hooked away by selfish evil, in spite of/due to our five years of successful togetherness. Somebody’s status was jeopardised, and we were ended. Writing our story is both my  get-square and forgiveness strategy. She still has my heart and we communicate, she under duress. I play and listen to music. Searching for meaning via poetry.
